title: Palo Alto Networks, Overstock, Clover Health, Lowe’s: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Palo Alto Networks delivered an earnings beat; Clover Health is due to report after the close
body:
Stock futures are up, suggesting Wall Street indexes will claw back some ground a day after the S&P 500 sank into a correction amid escalating tensions in Ukraine. Here’s what we’re watching in Wednesday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
